Title: Requires public bodies to ensure that proceedings of meetings are audible for individuals in person and via broadcast
Summary: Requires public bodies to make reasonable efforts to ensure that proceedings of meetings are audible for individuals in person and via broadcast and to provide audio visual equipment as necessary.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring public bodies to ensure that proceedings of meetings are audible for individuals in person and via broadcast
